data.name: Juanito Arcade Mayhem - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Let your ears join the ultimate arcade-hopping adventure, Juanito Arcade Mayhem, and take the beating rhythm of the Clonocell invasion along with you! The original soundtrack for Juanito Arcade Mayhem is composed by Mario Guerino, and includes bonus tracks only available on the full album!

Track List:
  • 01 - Main Theme
  • 02 - Investigate
  • 03 - Blockits
  • 04 - Arkadroid
  • 05 - Wonderdub
  • 06 - Snow Sises
  • 07 - Kung-Fu Dub
  • 08 - Monkey Gong
  • 09 - Pill-Man
  • 10 - Boing
  • 11 - Boss Stage 1
  • 12 - Boss Stage 2
  • 13 - Boss Stage 3


Tracks available as 320kbps MP3s and FLAC files.

You can find it in the folder Program Files> Steam> steamapps> common> Juanito Arcade Mayhem.

data.short_description: This content requires the base game Juanito Arcade Mayhem on Steam in order to play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any
  • Processor: Probably any
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Why would you need graphics for a soundtrack?!
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Ability to enjoy great music and a music player
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: A Windows version from the distant future
  • Processor: The fastest processor ever made, that only the creator has and hasn't been released yet
  • Memory: 99999 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphic card with the ability to make music mathematic functions. VERY NEEDED.
  • Storage: 99999 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card so awesome that makes music flow through your intestines till you evacuate it
  • Additional Notes: Good taste in music
